product_name: REI  Quarter Dome T3 Tent - Special Buy
long_description: Forget about small tents that cramp your backpacking style. The 3-season REI Quarter Dome T3 tent has room for 3 people so you and a few friends can embark on a spring, summer or fall adventure.
short_description: Forget about small tents that cramp your backpacking style. The 3-season REI Quarter Dome T3 tent has room for 3 people so you and a few friends can embark on a spring, summer or fall adventure.
